sentence.Network_en: Her mental capacity and temperament are as remarkable as his.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的才智和气质和他一样出众。

sentence.Network_en: Some of the models were given to fits of temperament.
His only weakness is his temperament.
sentence.Network_cn: 他唯一的缺点就是他那脾气。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 气质（temperament）是表现在心理活动的强度、速度、灵活性与指向性等方面的一种稳定的心理特征，即我们平时所说的脾气、秉 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin temperamentum 'correct mixture', from temperare 'mingle'. In early use the word was synonymous with the noun temper

encyclopedia.content: 气质，在《辞海》里释为：人的相对稳定的个性特点和风格气度。指诗文清峻慷慨的风格。

entry.def: Your temperament is your basic nature, especially as it is shown in the way that you react to situations or to other people.

example.ex: His impulsive temperament regularly got him into difficulties...
example.tran: 他容易冲动，经常因此惹麻烦。

example.ex: She was furtive and vicious by temperament.
example.tran: 她本来做事就偷偷摸摸，心肠狠毒。

entry.tran: 爱发脾气;脾气乖张;喜怒无常
entry.def: Temperament is the tendency to behave in an uncontrolled, bad-tempered, or unreasonable way.

example.ex: Mark does have a habit of allowing his temperament to get the better of him...
example.tran: 马克的确经常由着自己的性子来。

example.ex: Some of the models were given to fits of temperament.

means.word_mean: 2. excessive emotionalism or irritability and excitability (especially when displayed openly)
3. an adjustment of the intervals (as in tuning a keyboard instrument) so that the scale can be used to play in different keys

auth_sentence.content: Obama's calm is also a matter of temperament.

auth_sentence.content: This is, again, partly a matter of temperament.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =time,表示"时间或时间引起的现象"; 2. = "情绪,回火"

stems_affixes.word_buile: temper情绪,脾气+ate……的→脾气[不坏]→有节制的
temper情绪,回火→n.脾气;韧度v.调和,使缓和;使回火
temper情绪+ance表名词→脾气[不坏]→有节制
temper情绪,脾气+ament→脾气状态→性情
temper情绪,回火→n.脾气;韧度v.调和,使缓和;使回火

means.word_mean: 性格, 性情, 气质

sentences.cn: 成功常常取决于一个人的性格。

sentences.en: Jane is a girl with an artistic temperament.
sentences.cn: 简是一个有艺术家气质的女孩。

jushi.chinese: 成功常常取决于一个人的性格。

jushi.english: Jane is a girl with an artistic temperament.
jushi.chinese: 简是一个有艺术家气质的女孩。

jushi.english: By temperament he was an artist.
